FuncDef: This command enables certain fields to become the base for auto-generation of the default sub-id name. The sub-id name is auto generated if there is not a more specific method available. Such more specific methods would be a default sub-id name as a sap-id, a preconfigured static string or explicit mappings based on RADIUS/LUDB returned strings.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the auto-generated sub-id keys for IPoE hosts. Values-mac - Specifies that the MAC address can be combined with other subscriber host identification fields (circuit-id, remote-id, session-id or sap-id) to form a sub-id name in a user readable format or as a random 10 character encoded value..
